name: 100% Pure Vermont Maple Syrup - Pint
description: Nestled at the base of Mt. Mansfield, Vermont's tallest peak, is a third generation Underhill sugarbush. From this quiet, bucolic setting flows our 100% pure, all natural maple syrup.   Support Vermont agriculture and design and reap the rewards! 16 oz. glass bottle proudly made in the USA. We also have Maple Syrup in 1/2 Pint and 2 oz. bottles, as well as Cotton Bottle Bags. Grade options: Grade A Medium Amber is one of the lighter grades of Maple Syrup but not the lightest. It's probably the grade you've had the most of, the one you'll find at restaurants that serve real maple syrup. Grade B is the darkest of the grades. It has the strongest maple flavor and is very sweet, but still very palatable. --Maple Syrup ships via Parcel Post--

name: 100% Pure Vermont Maple Syrup - 1/2 Pint
description: Nestled at the base of Mt. Mansfield, Vermont's tallest peak, is a third generation Underhill sugarbush. From this quiet, bucolic setting flows our 100% pure, all natural maple syrup.   Support local Vermont agriculture and design and reap the rewards! 8 oz. glass bottle proudly made in the USA. We also have Maple Syrup in 1 Pint and 2 oz. bottles, as well as Cotton Bottle Bags. Grade options: Grade A Medium Amber is one of the lighter grades of Maple Syrup but not the lightest. It's probably the grade you've had the most of, the one you'll find at restaurants that serve real maple syrup. Grade B is the darkest of the grades. It has the strongest maple flavor and is very sweet, but still very palatable. --Maple Syrup ships via Parcel Post--

name: 100% Pure Vermont Maple Syrup - 2 oz.
description: Nestled at the base of Mt. Mansfield, Vermont's tallest peak, is a third generation Underhill sugarbush. From this quiet, bucolic setting flows our 100% pure, all natural maple syrup.   Support local Vermont agriculture and design and reap the rewards! 2 oz. glass bottle proudly made in the USA. We also have Maple Syrup in 1/2 Pint and 2 oz. bottles, as well as Cotton Bottle Bags. Grade options: Grade A Medium Amber is one of the lighter grades of Maple Syrup but not the lightest. It's probably the grade you've had the most of, the one you'll find at restaurants that serve real maple syrup. Grade B is the darkest of the grades. It has the strongest maple flavor and is very sweet, but still very palatable. --Maple Syrup ships via Parcel Post--

name: Satchel
description:
Handy little Syrup satchel to put things in. Makes a great gift bag for our Maple Syrup. 

The 4"x6" is good for one or two of our 2oz. bottles.
The 5"x8" is good for one 8oz. bottle or a notebook. 
The 6"x10" is good for one pint, onsie or smaller t-shirt. 

100% Cotton with cotton drawstring.

name: Syrup Vermont - Speckled Camp Mug
description: This large ceramic mug sets the standard for what it means to be sturdy. Wide based and full size handle - for gloved fingers - make this the perfect mug for your camp (cabin, if you're outside New England) or kitchen. Speckled, scratch resistant finish and rolled lip make this mug distinct.
